001package io.github.ai4ci.abm.behaviour;
002
003import static io.github.ai4ci.abm.ModelNav.modelState;
004import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.complianceFatigue;
005import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.decreaseSociabilityIfCompliant;
006import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.doLFT;
007import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.doPCR;
008import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.isHighRiskOfInfectionAndCompliant;
009import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.isLFTTestingAllowed;
010import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.isPCRTestingAllowed;
011import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.isPositiveTestToday;
012import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.isSymptomaticAndCompliant;
013import static io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.resetBehaviour;
014
015import io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonHistory;
016import io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonState;
017import io.github.ai4ci.abm.ModelNav;
018import io.github.ai4ci.abm.PersonState;
019import io.github.ai4ci.abm.TestResult.Result;
020import io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.State;
021import io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateMachineContext;
022import io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.StateUtils.DefaultNoTesting;
023import io.github.ai4ci.util.Sampler;
024
025/**
026 * A behaviour model for people who will test reactively with LFTs, and then
027 * reflexively with PCRs. This is a more compliant behaviour than the default
028 * symptomatic testing, but less compliant than the reactive PCR testing model.
029 *
030 * @author Rob Challen
031 *
032 */
033public enum SmartAgentLFTTesting implements BehaviourModel, DefaultNoTesting {
034
035        /**
036         * Patient will probably test using a LFT if they have symptoms. Results are
037         * available immediately so they will isolate immediately if they have a
038         * positive test, but will not isolate if they have symptoms but a negative
039         * test. If they have a positive LFT, they will then get a PCR test to
040         * confirm, and isolate while awaiting the result.
041         */
042        REACTIVE_LFT {
043
044                @Override
045                public State.BehaviourState nextState(
046                                ImmutablePersonState.Builder builder, PersonState person,
047                                StateMachineContext context, Sampler rng
048                ) {
049                        if (isPositiveTestToday(person)) {
050                                decreaseSociabilityIfCompliant(builder, person);
051                                return REFLEX_PCR;
052                        } else
053                                return REACTIVE_LFT;
054                }
055
056                @Override
057                public void updateHistory(
058                                ImmutablePersonHistory.Builder builder, PersonState person,
059                                StateMachineContext context, Sampler rng
060                ) {
061
062                        if (isSymptomaticAndCompliant(person, 2)
063                                        || isHighRiskOfInfectionAndCompliant(
064                                                        person,
065                                                        ModelNav.modelParam(person).getSmartAppRiskTrigger()
066                                        )) {
067                                if (isLFTTestingAllowed(person)) {
068                                        doLFT(builder, person, context);
069                                }
070                        }
071
072                }
073
074        },
075        /**
076         * Patient will test with PCR if they have symptoms and a positive LFT, then
077         * wait for the result.
078         */
079        REFLEX_PCR {
080
081                @Override
082                public State.BehaviourState nextState(
083                                ImmutablePersonState.Builder builder, PersonState person,
084                                StateMachineContext context, Sampler rng
085                ) {
086                        if (context.isReactivelyTestedToday()) {
087                                decreaseSociabilityIfCompliant(builder, person);
088                                return AWAIT_PCR;
089                        } else {
090                                if (!isPCRTestingAllowed(person)) {
091                                        resetBehaviour(builder, person);
092                                        return REACTIVE_LFT;
093                                }
094                                return REFLEX_PCR;
095                        }
096                }
097
098                @Override
099                public void updateHistory(
100                                ImmutablePersonHistory.Builder builder, PersonState person,
101                                StateMachineContext context, Sampler rng
102                ) {
103
104                        // Maybe put a delay in here otherwise it will be next day PCR.
105                        if (isPCRTestingAllowed(person)) { doPCR(builder, person, context); }
106
107                }
108        },
109
110        /**
111         * Patient will isolate if they have a positive PCR, but will wait for the
112         * result.
113         */
114        AWAIT_PCR {
115                @Override
116                public State.BehaviourState nextState(
117                                ImmutablePersonState.Builder builder, PersonState person,
118                                StateMachineContext context, Sampler rng
119                ) {
120                        if (person.isLastTestExactly(Result.PENDING)) return AWAIT_PCR;
121                        if (person.isLastTestExactly(Result.POSITIVE)) return SELF_ISOLATE;
122                        resetBehaviour(builder, person);
123                        return REACTIVE_LFT;
124                }
125        },
126        /**
127         * Patient will isolate if they have a positive PCR for an average duration
128         * of the presumed disease infectious period.
129         */
130        SELF_ISOLATE {
131                @Override
132                public State.BehaviourState nextState(
133                                ImmutablePersonState.Builder builder, PersonState person,
134                                StateMachineContext context, Sampler rng
135                ) {
136                        if (!person.isCompliant()) {
137                                resetBehaviour(builder, person);
138                                return Symptomatic.DEFAULT;
139                        }
140                        if (!person.isSymptomatic()) {
141                                if (rng.periodTrigger(
142                                                modelState(person).getPresumedInfectiousPeriod(), 0.95
143                                )) {
144                                        resetBehaviour(builder, person);
145                                        return REACTIVE_LFT;
146                                }
147                        }
148                        complianceFatigue(builder, person);
149                        return SELF_ISOLATE;
150                }
151        };
152
153}
